title: Informed Interview Intelligence Platform Privacy Policy
content:
Informed Decisions LTD ("Informed Decisions", or "us," "our," "we") has developed an interview platform (the” Platform”) to interview and assess potential and current employees. The platform uses algorithms and analysis of data in order to produce a detailed assessment of each participant's fit for an employment position and to provide insight to decision makers to support people decisions. The platform is integrated into the organization's internal employee assessment tools. The use of the Platform is subject to this Privacy Policy (the "Privacy Policy"). "You" includes anyone using the Platform for any reason, including anyone conducting interviews, serving as an administrator of the Platform, and anyone generating or using reports via the Platform. If not otherwise defined herein, capitalized terms have the meaning given to them in the Terms of Service, which is available here (the "Terms").

Informed Decisions respects your right to privacy and your ability to make educated decisions about your personal information. This Privacy Policy describes the types of information we collect, and how we use, transfer and protect the information we receive, as well as your ability to control certain uses of the collected information.

"Personal Information" means information that can be directly associated with a specific person such as a name, address, telephone number, or e-mail address.

You are under no obligation to provide us with any Personal Information and provision of such information is entirely at your discretion and with your consent, however, if you do not consent to provide any or all such information, we may not be able to provide (a portion of) the Services through the Platform.

Information We Collect

We collect information from anyone who utilizes the Platform, including any information you provide when you use the Platform, and any information input into the Platform. For example, in order to utilize the Platform, you will be required to register an account and provide us with certain Personal Information such as your name and additional information. We will collect and store such information. We may also collect Personal Information from others using the Platform, such as from employers about their employees, including names and information regarding a User's performances of the Assessment and/or the User's function.

In addition to the information detailed above, certain information may be automatically gathered about your computer, mobile device, operating Platform, IP address, browsing history, or browser. We also collect any information you provide when contacting us for any reason.

How We Use Information

Services and Customization

We may use Personal Information or other information for the provision of Services to the Company, including but not limited to Reports and analysis.

We may also use Personal Information or other information for internal purposes – for example, to help diagnose problems with our servers, to improve and customize the Platform and/or Services.

Statistical Information

By analyzing all information we receive, including all information concerning users, we may compile statistical information across a variety of such information and users ("Statistical Information"). Statistical Information helps us understand performance of candidates and employees and individual hiring needs in order to improve and optimize the hiring process and in order to customize the Services and the Platform and the attendant services for different needs. Statistical Information is anonymous and aggregated and we will not link Statistical Information to any Personal Information. We may share such Statistical Information with the Company or our business partners, without restriction, on commercial terms that we can determine in our sole discretion.

Analytics

We may use certain tools, including, but not limited to, "Google Analytics" to analyze the Statistical Information ("Tools"). We do not combine the information collected through the use of the Tools with personally identifiable information. We may transfer the Statistical Information to clients and partners (as described below) and we may use the information we get from the Tools to improve the Platform.

The information collected by Google Analytics about your use of the Platform is restricted by the Google Analytics Terms of Use located at http://www.google.com/analytics/terms/us.html and the Google Privacy Policy located at http://www.google.com/policies/privacy/.

How We Use and Share Your Information

Except as expressly set forth herein, we will not disclose your Personal Information to third parties without your expressed consent, except in the following circumstances: (i) if we discover that your use of the Platform and/or Services violates the Terms or that your use is the purpose of fraud of any kind; (ii) if we face the threat of legal action (criminal or civil) due to your use of the Platform and/or Services; (iii) as required by law, regulation, subpoena, court order, or as required by law enforcement authorities. We will cooperate fully with any law enforcement authorities or any court order requiring us to disclose the identity and/or behavior of anyone suspected of unlawful conduct.

We may use and share your information, including Personal Information, as follows:

Business Partners, Service Providers, Affiliates, and Subcontractors

We may disclose information, including Personal Information we collect from and/or about you to the Company for the purpose of providing the Services, or to certain service providers, subcontractors, affiliates and business partners (together with the Company, "Authorized Third Parties"), who may use such information to: (1) help us provide you and the Company with the Services and (2) to aid in their understanding of how users are utilizing our Platform and Services.

Authorized Third Parties may be located in countries other than your own. All Authorized Third Parties will be subject to non-disclosure and non-use obligations. Nevertheless, some countries may have levels of protection of personal and other information which are not as high as in your country of residence or business.

Business Transfer

We may transfer our databases containing your Personal Information if we sell our business or part of it.

Law Enforcement Related Disclosure

We will fully cooperate with any law enforcement authorities or court order requesting or directing us to disclose the identity, behavior or digital content of any user suspected to have engaged in illegal or infringing behavior. We may also share your Personal Information with third parties if we believe in good faith that disclosure is appropriate to protect our rights, property or safety (including the enforcement of the Privacy Policy), or to protect the rights, property or safety of third parties. You can request such Personal Information as specified herein by emailing us at info@informedecisions.com.

How We Protect Information

We make efforts to follow generally-accepted industry standards to protect the Personal Information submitted to and collected by us, both during transmission and once we receive it. However, no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. Therefore, while we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

Communications

Please note that we reserve the right to send you service-related communications, including service announcements and administrative messages, relating either to your account or to your activities related to the Platform and/or Services, without offering you the opportunity to opt out of receiving them. Should you not wish to receive such communications you may cancel your account.

Children

We do not knowingly collect personally-identifiable information from or market to children under the age of 13. In the event that you become aware that an individual under the age of 13 has enrolled without parental permission, please advise us immediately.

The right to review and change information

The user has the right to request for review the information gathered on him by Informed Decisions, including in the reports, in accordance with the provisions of the law. What about the candidates /employees being interviewed?

Deletion or correction of Personal Information

We will correct or delete information provided to us about a User within a reasonable time from the receipt of a written request, which may be sent to info@informedecisions.com by such user to correct its Personal Information or to delete its account, to the extent required by applicable law, provided, however, that we may retain a copy of certain information for audit and record-keeping purposes. We cannot restore information once it has been deleted.

Cookies

Informed Decisions may use cookies (i.e. small pieces of text that are stored by the server on the hard drive of the computer you are using), in order to provide the Services in a fast and efficient manner and will be used to recognize you as a valid user so that you will not need to log in each time you use the Platform. It is clarified that cookies do not contain any information that identifies you personally and you can change your settings so that your browser either refuses all cookies or informs you when a cookie is being sent. Also, you are free to delete any existing cookies at any time.

Retention

We keep the collected information as long as it remains necessary to provide our Users with access to and use of the Platform and/or Services, comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and/or enforce our agreements. We may delete information from our Platform, without notice to you, once we deem it is no longer necessary for the purposes set forth above.

European Citizens

The following disclosures are made pursuant to the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR(:

  • You have the right to withdraw your consent at any time to processing your information for marketing purposes; and to submit a complaint to the relevant supervisory data protection authority.
  • Informed Decisions is the data controller in respect of the processing activities outlined in this Privacy Policy.

Changes and Deletion of Information

By using our Platform, you automatically accept the terms of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with the terms, please do not use the Platform associated with them. We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy from time to time at our sole discretion. By continuing to access or use the Platform and/or Services after those changes become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised privacy policy.

Comments and Questions

If you have any comments or questions about our privacy policy, please contact us at info@informedecisions.com

Last updated: March 2022
